SEARCH
Package abm

Class Meteorite

java.lang.Object
abm.Agent
abm.Meteorite
public class Meteorite extends Agent
The Meteorite class represents a meteorite agent within the simulation. Meteorites move with a random direction and speed, and upon collision with a planet, they break into smaller fragments (the fragmentation is still in work).

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Meteorite

      public Meteorite(double x, double y, double speed)
      This constructor initializes a Meteorite object with its initial position (X and Y coordinates) and speed. It also generates a random direction vector for the meteorite's movement.
      Parameters:
      x - The X coordinate.
      y - The Y coordinate.
      speed - The speed of the meteorite.

  • Method Details

    • move

      public void move()
      This function implements the movement behavior for meteorites. It updates the meteorite's position based on its speed and movement vector.
      Overrides:
      move in class Agent

    • handleCollision

      public void handleCollision(Agent other, List<Agent> agentsToRemove)
      This function defines how a meteorite handles a collision with another agent. The default behavior of 'Agent' is to be removed upon collision with a meteorite. Here, we override that behavior to remove the collided planet and create new meteorite fragments at the planet's location.
      Overrides:
      handleCollision in class Agent
      Parameters:
      other - The other agent involved in the collision.
      agentsToRemove - A list to add agents for removal during collision handling.
